name: hypernym-icons
author: Hypernym Studio
description: An ultra-minimalistic VSCode icon set for modern devs.

hypernym-icons.hidesExplorerArrows.markdownDescription:
Specifies the visibility of the explorer arrows. 

 Default: `true`

hypernym-icons.folders.color.markdownDescription:
Specifies a custom color for folder icons. Accepts valid HEX color format. 

 Default: `undefined` 

 Example: `#fff`, `#ffffff`, `#ffffff33`

hypernym-icons.folders.size.markdownDescription:
Specifies a custom size for folder icons. Accepts a percentage size format. 

 Default: `undefined` 

 Example: `130%`

hypernym-icons.icons.color.markdownDescription:
Specifies a custom color for all icons. Accepts valid HEX color format. 

 Default: `undefined` 

 Example: `#fff`, `#ffffff`, `#ffffff33`

hypernym-icons.icons.size.markdownDescription:
Specifies a custom size for all icons. Accepts a percentage size format. 

 Default: `undefined` 

 Example: `130%`

scripts.build:all: pnpm build:static && pnpm build:theme && pnpm build:bundle
scripts.export:extension: pnpm build:static && pnpm build:theme && pnpm build:bundle --production && vsce package --no-dependencies
scripts.publish:extension: pnpm build:static && pnpm build:theme && pnpm build:bundle --production && vsce publish --no-dependencies
scripts.dev: pnpm build:static && pnpm build:theme && bun run ./scripts/build-watch.ts
